DOC.brief_summary: The investigator test efficacy tailor behavioral lifestyle modification program support cardiovascular health postpartum woman excessive gestational weight gain . This program include mobile health texting component postpartum support change nutrition physical activity . The investigator randomize woman either control arm ( usual care ) intervention ( usual care + mobile health program postpartum ) . The woman recruit 3rd trimester identify gain much weight accord 2009 IOM guideline pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Health Postpartum Women Diagnosed With Excessive Gestational Weight Gain
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman diagnose excessive gestational weight 24 week gestation later Age 18 year old Englishspeaking , willing able participate propose intervention . Inability provide inform consent and/or inability speak , read , understand English Primary residence outside immediate catchment area 10 mile Physical mental challenge preclude exercise return schedule study follow ups Concurrent enrollment another behavior modification program
